en.link_did_not_redirect: If the page does not jump, please click the link to enter the CC video.
en.user_did_not_have_cc_account: The cloud video service is not enabled. To enable it, contact the administrator to apply for a cloud video service.

zh-CN.link_did_not_redirect: 如果页面没有跳转，请点击链接进入CC视频。
zh-CN.user_did_not_have_cc_account: 未开启云视频服务，如需开启，请联系管理员申请云视频服务
